comment.author: 45665251@N00
comment._content: And as anyone who's spent time in Cairo could tell you, all the more remarkable considering the air quality there. Great shot.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: That's so funny you mention it!  Mary was in our office posting this and I was saying how this was my favorite shot in the series - she said it only got clear like this for one day near the very end of the trip!  ~shelley
